title: Online Training Program for Enhancing Male Mental Health Counseling Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Adult education-based online training with simulation/VR technology for novice learners in social domains, emphasizing practical skill development

learning_goals: Analyze gender socialization processes of male clients and apply them to counseling strategies.
Identify depression and suicide risk factors in male clients through VR simulations and acquire skills to respond effectively.
Evaluate and improve male-centered counseling approaches using reflective practice tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
